summary: UI/UX updates and a dashboard data bugfix: resize category buttons, standardize button colors, fix documents-by-direction count from backend, and improve settings form styling.
architectural_notes: Dashboard 'Documents by direction' count should be sourced from an existing backend documents field (not computed client-side).
known_issues: Dashboard 'Documents by direction' count currently shows 0 (not responding).

existing_features.title: On the Dashboard page, reduce the visual size of the “Browse by Category” category cards/buttons by ~50% (padding, icon size, and typography) while keeping the same number of categories and the same click/navigation behavior.
On the Dashboard page, update the category action button styling so the category buttons use a light blue color as the primary visual accent (consistent across light/dark modes).
Update the Upload page primary action button styling so the upload button uses color #0052cc (including hover/active states) and remains readable in both light and dark modes.

In Settings, style the “Add Category” button so it appears inside a visually distinct box using color #0052cc, and ensure the Add Category / Add Office forms have a solid (non-transparent) background when opened (solid white in light mode).

new_feature_requests.summary: Dashboard: reduce category button size by 50% and use light blue button color
Dashboard: fix 'Documents by direction' count showing 0 by pulling correct count from backend documents field
Upload screen: set upload/download button color to #0052cc
Settings: style 'Add category' button inside a box colored #0052cc
Settings: when Add Category/Add Office forms open, use solid (non-transparent) white background for the form container

Fix “Documents by Direction” counts on the Dashboard so Inward/Outward/Important reflect the actual number of stored documents by reading the direction field from the backend documents data (not returning 0 when documents exist).
